title: RP won't process into my account
body: It has been over two hours now and my client is still apparently trying to load my RP into my account. It says in some rare cases it may take up to 30 minutes to go through however it has been quite a while longer than that. Is it okay for me to close the window? Will i get charged anyway?

replies.body: If you still haven't received the RP you've purchased, reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll work with you to sort this out. ^.^
